subject: Fashion
title: Smart Textiles and Wearables
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Smart Textiles and Wearables.

hook.text: A jacket that heats up, tracks your heart, and charges your phone.

buildup.text: Smart textiles embed sensors, conductors, or LEDs directly into fabric.

discovery.text: Google's Project Jacquard wove touch-sensitive threads into a denim jacket.

twist.text: Washing, stretching, and durability remain unsolved headaches.

climax.text: Military and medical fields lead adoption where the tech justifies the cost.

punchline.text: Clothes that think are coming. Slowly.

quiz.question: What was Google's Project Jacquard?
